body:
There are a few materials every programmer should know inside and out.

The most important is [xkcd]{link|url=https://xkcd.com/}. There's a [relevant xkcd]{link|url=https://relevant-xkcd.com/} for virtually every situation!

Another famous source of wisdom is [Dilbert]{link|url=https://dilbert.com/} who used to wear an amazing tie.
